title: Once upon a time in China III
creator_credit: Tsui Hark, Ng See Yuen, Film Workshop and Golden Harvest
brief_description: The third adventure sees martial arts champion Jet Lee journey to Beijing to visit his father who runs a medicine factory. He arrives on the eve of the Lion Dance martial arts festival where rival factions are stirring up trouble. Once he enters the contest, things really heat up and non-stop action and amazing feats of strength and skill are the result. In Cantonese with English and Chinese subtitles.
